title: Watch Face - Marine Digital
summary: Military Style Watch Face with Sound & Interactive Features for Android Wear 2.0

descriptionHTML:
Marine Digital Interactive Watch Face !! A Unique Military Style Watch face with Hourly Chime Sound effect, Touch Sound Effects and many Interactive Features for Android Wear 2.0.



★Tap Features (*Available Only in Premium Version)

✔ Tap on "CENTER" of Watch face to change colors of watch face with Touch.
✔ Tap on "STOPWATCH" on Upper Left corner of Watch face for Interactive Stop watch.
✔ Tap on "MENU" on Upper Right corner of Watch face for Apps Launcher Menu.
✔ Tap on "AGENDA" on Lower Right corner of Watch face for to get Info of 4 Upcoming Calendar Events.
✔ Tap on "TIMER" on Lower Left corner of Watch face for Timer App.
✔ Tap on "WEATHER" on main Watch Face to get 4 days Weather Forecast and Other Weather Info.
✔ Tap on "STEPS" to Get Google Fit Data
✔ Tap on "BATTERY" to Switch Between Phone/Watch Battery.



★ Free Version

✔ Unique Military Style Digital Watch Face.
✔ Android Wear 2.0 Fully supported.
✔ Standalone watch face for iPhone and Android users.
✔ Current Weather info
✔ Watch Battery Info
✔ Date, Day, Month Name
✔ Black & White Ambient Mode.
✔ HD Graphics for All Watches Resolutions



★ Premium Version Features

✔ Hourly Chime Sound effect and Vibration on every hour
✔ Touch Sound Effect and Touch Vibration.
✔ 15 Predefined watch face Colors Combinations, Changes on tap
✔ Unique Military Style Digital Watch Face
✔ Custom Colors For Interactive & Ambient Mode
✔ Interactive Stop Watch For Sports Activity
✔ App Launcher Menu
✔ Upcoming 4 Calendar Events info
✔ Your Custom Name on Watch Face (Change Watch Face Settings)
✔ Weather Forecast for Next 4 Days, High/Low Temp, Wind Speed, Sunset/Sunrise info
✔Two Weather Providers
✔ GPS or Manually Select Weather Location Option for Correct Weather
✔ Fully Accurate Pedometer with Google Fit Integration
✔ Switch Between Phone and Watch battery with one Touch
✔ Screen Bright Time Option
✔ 12/24 Hour Digital Clock.
✔ Special Design For Moto 360 (Flat Tire)
✔ Choose Between Full and Black and White Ambient Modes.
✔ Tap on 8 Touch Points To Get Different Feature Select.
✔ Date and New Style Day Name.



★Supported All Watches Resolutions

★Compatible with Android Wear Watches Only , Not for Samsung Watches

Moto 360 (1st Gen)
Moto 360 2015 (42mm, 46mm)
Moto 360 Sports
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R
LG G Watch W100
LG Watch Urbane
LG Watch Urbane 2
Sony Smartwatch 3
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch (1,2,3)
Fossil Q
Casio WSD-F10
TAG Heuer




★How To Use

1. You Can Enable or Disable Sound effects and Vibration from Companion app
2. Please Enable "Location" or "GPS" in Phone To get Weather Info, with Active Internet Connection
3. Select Manual Weather Location in Companion App Settings To Set Your Manual Weather Location
4. Change Name though Watch Face Settings
5 You can change watch face colors with Tap or through Watch Face settings


★How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 1.0?

1. After install run 'Re-sync app' from the Android Wear app
2. Long press your watch and choose "Marine Digital Watch Face" as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app



★How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 2.0?

1. Install it from Google Play Wear Store on your watch
2. Install the companion app for fully customization (Android phone devices)


★Useful Tip
✔ Sometimes you need to wait longer for transfer to watch
✔I recommend a bit of patience .
✔This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after few minutes, to try re-sync or follow these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face


★Our Wear face collection https://goo.gl/RxW9Cs

IMPORTANT NOTE:Your watch Must have speaker to get Sound Effects

NOTE:if any problem first email us before leaving a 1 star rating on Play Store
comments: Was very excited to find the updated version. I had the old version but it never aligned correctly on my Huawei watch. This version looks great. The only request I have is could you make it so you can't change the color scheme when tapping the watch, but can still use the other interactive functions? With it on I always change my watch face color which is annoying. Unfortunately if I turn it off I can't access anything on the watch. I think the option to select the color scheme should be a totally separate on and off option from the other interactive functions. Thanks and keep up the great work.
Why the weather needs to be manually updated?
Love this and unlocked premium but when i touch Agenda in edge of bottom-right in my moto360 i see no events, when i have events in google calendar. can you please advise how to fix this problem?
liked it before, now iis even better ☺️

Like the watch face itself, lots of data and easy to read, weather interactive works really well.  However the options around the face (Stopwatch, Timer, Agenda, Menu) seem to be hit and miss, trying to get them to work can sometimes take a dozen or more touches.  I'm using the Moto 360G2 so I'm not sure if it is the watch but very frustrating, especially the Menu Option.  Also although the app provides the ability to change the colours of the ambient mode it does not appear to work, not matter what I set the ambient mode stays as white text on black background.  There is no date in ambient mode which really should be a standard feature.  Lastly the constant ads still popping up after paying for premium are extremely annoying.  I appreciate that paying for premium unlocks the features but it should remove the adds as well especially since you sometimes have to go through 2 or 3 of them to get into the app.  Thankfully once the face is setup I won't have to access the app very often so I can deal with it.
recentChanges: - Fix App Shortcut selector not shown in phone app.
- Completely New Look of Watch face.
- Added Steps info with Distance and Calorie burn info.
- Changes some graphics elements of watch face regarding batteries.
- Added New watch face layouts for Weather forecast, Stopwatch, Steps, Agenda events and many more.
- More clear Free and Paid Version.
